modName: Ariia - Breton mage destruction Follower - ESSENTIAL
summary:
This young Breton girl is waiting for you!
Keep her to adventure. She\'s essential.
descriptionHtml:
Ariia was boring at the College of Winterhold so she decided to leave.
For quite a while, she\'s waiting at The Frozen Heart... she wants to go off in search of adventure but Ariia is too inexperienced to travel without a mentor.

Keep her with you and be this mentor -.- She\'s mariable.

(sorry if my english isn\'t very good) 

*** MOD REQUIRES ***

Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only (by Radioragae) - Oblivionhairs 04
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110#content

--- TO LOOK LIKE ARIIA --- (not an obligation)

univision Face (by DD AKT)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569

xxx OPTIONAL FILES xxx

saved game.
Level 1 at the Guardians Stones.
No main quest done.
author: Fonkyb
